name: Syrup Finance
description: SRX is the native and governance token of Syrup's Ecosystem. It allows participants to drive the future of Syrup. Suggest and vote on proposals that will move Syrup forward. Other utilities include: • SRX stakers receive 30% of the platform-wide fees incurred, split among all SRX holders • Guarantees airdrops on all future products that are part of the Syrup Ecosystem.
